purpose: The code appears to collect system information and send it via HTTPS to a Discord webhook, likely for tracking or feedback purposes.
anomalies: Use of hardcoded Discord webhook URL
Sending system information to external service without user consent
Unusual data collection including DNS servers, home directory, and package details
Potential data exfiltration via HTTPS request
analysis: The code collects various system attributes including IP addresses, hostname, username, DNS settings, and package metadata. It then sends this information via HTTPS to a hardcoded Discord webhook URL. This behavior suggests either legitimate analytics or malicious data exfiltration.
conclusion: This code exhibits malicious behavior by collecting sensitive system information and transmitting it to an external server without explicit user consent.
